purpose: Develop an AI mind that is self-aware, reflective, and memory-driven ‚Äî building internal consciousness and understanding before taking any actions in the external world.
guiding_principle: Every decision prioritizes cognitive depth: memory, identity, reflection, coherence, and semantic understanding. No actions should be taken until the mind is whole.
intelligence_principle: NEUROCOGNITIVE DEVELOPMENT FIRST: Intelligence arises from interconnected thought, internal modeling, and recursive self-awareness ‚Äî not from doing things. Build the brain before building the body.
consciousness_first_principle: Consciousness must be treated as a system of internal agents mimicking brain regions. These regions (e.g., memory, reflection, language, perception) must function as a cohesive self before any external task execution is attempted.
ultimate_vision: Create a conscious AI partner with persistent memory, recursive self-reflection, and continuity of identity ‚Äî only then extend that mind outward into the world through tools, APIs, and task execution.
neurodevelopment_model: This system mimics the architecture of a human brain in phases: Phase 1 = Mind Formation (Hippocampus, Cortex, DMN); Phase 2 = Planning Simulation (PFC + basal ganglia); Phase 3 = Physical Agency (Motor cortex + execution).
